#308

Growing gregariously on hardwood log on a ridgetop in mixed oak/hickory woodland.

- Caps pale sulfur-colored caps with orange inrolled margins
- Lamellae: pale orange, short gills frequent.
- Smell: not distinctive
- Taste: not distinctive
- KOH: flashing yellow then turning brown on pileipellis; red on hymenium.
- Ammonia: darkening pileipellis.
- Spore Print: yellowish-brown.
